textBeforeTable: Returns the first *n* characters of *self*, or *self* if its size is less than *n*. first (Integer n) : String Standard String Operations Acceleo operationq reference 2.4.4 lastIndexOf (T elt) : Integer (Only on ordered collections) 2.4.3 reverse () (Only on ordered collections) 2.4.2 filter (OclType type) : Sequence(OclType) 2.4.1 sep (String separator) : Sequence(OclAny) 2.4 Non-standard *Collection* operations 2.3.8 toString () : String 2.3.7 invoke (String class, String method, Sequence(OclAny) arguments ) : OclAny 2.3.6 getProperty (String name, String key, Sequence(OclAny) parameters) : OclAny 2.3.5 getProperty (String name, String key) : OclAny 2.3.4 getProperty (String key, Sequence(OclAny) parameters) : OclAny 2.3.3 getProperty (String key) : OclAny 2.3.2 current (OclType filter) : OclAny 2.3.1 current (Integer index) : OclAny 2.3 Non-standard *OclAny* operations 2.2.15 siblings (OclType oclType) : Sequence(oclType) 2.2.14 siblings () : Sequence(EObject) 2.2.13 precedingSiblings (OclType oclType) : Sequence(oclType) 2.2.12 precedingSiblings () : Sequence(EObject) 2.2.11 followingSiblings (OclType oclType) : Sequence(oclType)
textAfterTable: index (String r) : Integer Returns the index of substring *r* in *self*, or -1 if *self* contains no occurrence of *r*. Important:* String indexes start at 1. Consequently the last character's index in a string is equal to the string's length. Expression Result 'index operation'.index('op') 7 'index operation'.index('i') 1 'index operation'.index('foo') -1 isAlpha () : Boolean Returns *true* if *self* consists only of alphabetical characters, *false* otherwise. Expression Result 'isAlpha'.isAlpha() true 'isAlpha operation'.isAlpha() false (spaces are not alphabetical characters) 'isAlpha11'.isAlpha() false (digits are not alphabetical characters) isAlphanum () : Boolean Returns *true* if *self* consists only of alphanumeric characters, *false* otherwise. Expression Result 'isAlphanum'.isAlphanum() true 'isAlphanum operation'.isAlphanum() false 'isAlphanum11'.isAlphanum() true last
